title: "Slay me," said the dragon.
description: So Drake, a real twink of a college kid, is looking for his roommate. He finds him in a leather bar, except it is really a dragon den and Drake is really a Dragon Slayer. “Slay me,” said the dragon. is a wacky short story about star crossed lovers and unintended consequences. Short Story, about 14K words
author: Stephen del Mar
